author: PTI
title: Coronavirus | CAPFs seek live WhatsApp location from troops on leave, working from home to prevent COVID-19 spread
description: All CAPFs have been asked to collect this WhatsApp-based data on a daily basis
content: The paramilitary forces have directed that live location of all officers and jawans allowed to work from home or on leave should be obtained daily to prevent the spread of COVID-19 after two positive cases were reported among them, officials said on March 30.… [+3847 chars]
